html: PSA for Stop & Shop employees Anyone on strike is eligible for unemployment (http://www.filectui.com ) Under reason select “strike/labor dispute”. Additional help for veterans may be available through the Soldiers,Sailors and Marines Fund. My office is available for assistance.
text:
PSA for Stop & Shop employees
Anyone on strike is eligible for unemployment (http://www.filectui.com ) Under reason select “strike/labor dispute”. Additional help for veterans may be available through the Soldiers,Sailors and Marines Fund. My office is available for assistance.

html: Interesting: we've spent some time here today talking about guidance and a new initiative on R&S from @usedgov. But @RepJahanaHayes, filling in as subcommittee chair, makes the point that department guidance is "not binding policy," highlighting the need for federal law.
text:
Interesting: we've spent some time here today talking about guidance and a new initiative on R&S from @usedgov.

But @RepJahanaHayes, filling in as subcommittee chair, makes the point that department guidance is "not binding policy," highlighting the need for federal law.
